title: SOLD: 1887 Old Judge N172 John Clarkson (HOF) SGC 20
author: h2oya311

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1887 Old Judge N172 John Clarkson (HOF) SGC 20
posts.post_content:
1887 Old Judge N172 - John Clarkson - '0442' Chicago - SGC 20 - $SOLD

Unbelievable image, technical grade is obviously for the crease down the middle, but it really doesn't detract from the image.  Far superior to any "pink" and "light image" Old Judges floating around there.

Price includes insured shipping + paypal fees, etc.  First to e-mail "I'll take it" to [url]h2oya311@yahoo.com[/url] has rights to the card.  See my collection (link below) for other cards I'm selling.
